publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7327 Bruce Crawford: Housing (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Housing (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limit indicated, that time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when a meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Groups 1 to 3: 30 minutes Groups 4 to 6: 1 hour Groups 7 to 9: 1 hour 40 minutes Groups 10 and 11: 2 hours. Supported by: Alex Neil*
